Name: Name
ColumnFilterInfo: Search for data using column filters.

PlayerPage.EditInfo: Make changes to the player '{{name}}' here. Click save when you're done.
PlayerPage.DeleteInfo_one: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete player '{{name}}' and remove him from all matches, but will not change the results of the matches.
PlayerPage.DeleteInfo_other: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the selected players and remove them from all matches, but will not change the results of the matches.
PlayerPage.AddNewPlayerInfo: Create a new Player here. Click save when you're done.

MatchPage.EditInfo: Make changes to the match '{{name}}' here. Click save when you're done.
MatchPage.DeleteInfo_one: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete match '{{name}}}'.
MatchPage.DeleteInfo_other: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the selected matches.
MatchPage.AddNewMatchInfo: Create a new match here. Click save when you're done.
